channel.title: express on bartlomiejdanek
channel.description: Recent content in express on bartlomiejdanek

item.title: Zaawansowany JavaScript cz. 2
item.description: Wprowadzenie HTTP - Hypertext Transfer Protocol (*S) API - Application Programming Interface REST - Representational State Transfer JSON - JavaScript Object Notation Metody HTTP GET /users, /users/1, /users/1/friends POST /users data: name: jane PUT /users/:userId, data: name: lucy DELETE /users/:userId Cwiczenia Przykladowy projekt z biblioteka express. Alternatywy dla aplikacji curl Advanced REST Client Restlet Client RESTClient GET app.get('/get', function (req, res) { res.send('-> get') }) curl http://localhost:4000/get POST app.
